text:
when calling WebdavResource.listWebdavResources(), all the HREFs returned by
mod_dav_fs are relative (e.g. "foo/", "bar/").
WebdavResource.setWebdavProperties does not find a slash at the beginning of
this HREF, so it thinks it must call GenericURI.getPath(href).

GenericURI.getPath makes the HREF unusable, rendering every collection element
(HREF ending with slash) to "/".
creator: max@linuxtag.org

text:
This appears not to have been applied to 2.1 nor HEAD.  Will it be applied? 
This bug currently makes using Slide with our Apache 1.3.x mod_webdav unusable
without a workaround like calling propFindmethod directly and parsing results
which is cumbersome.
